page.title: 18LIFE STYLES IN ASTON-J-M
page.content: Approximately 1/3 of the population (adults & children) regularly attend a {church or chapel},but often this does not include all family members. Very few households have no{pets or other {domestic animals.}Dogs, cats, rabbits, goldfish, hens, ponies & goats are all kept. Most housewives choose to make 1 {main shopping trip}to a major store in Crewe or Nantwich,travelling by car. These are sometimes augmented by visits to local shops or occasionally by trips to larger shopping centres such as Chester or Manchester. 2/3 of the households take a{holiday}away from home during the year,usually in summer. Of these 1/2 frequently go abroad,with the remainder choosing Great Britain. Types of holiday include caravanning, package tours, and "bed-and-breakfast" accomodation.
